description:
Kamiyama Sakuya is an extremely wealthy freshman who has an obsessive crush on http://anidb.net/ch11337 [Kanade]. She is prone to stealing Kanade`s things for her collection and trades snacks to http://anidb.net/ch11338 [Yukino] for photos of Kanade. Despite her overwhelming presence, the twins seem to get along with her.
Source: English Wikipedia
name: Kamiyama Sakuya
